job.title: Pursuits Systems Engineer (2021)
job.description: Nexteer Automotive is looking for a technically skilled and highly focused individual who enjoys developing & integrating mechanical & electrical components into a mechatronic system. The focus of this position is to lead the elicitation of customer requirements and collaborate with the organization to have them understood by sub-system teams in order to develop a design proposal. The System Pursuit Engineer will then lead technical discussions concerning the selected system design with the customer. This opportunity requires daily customer interactions, so excellent technical communication skills are necessary. This position interacts with both internal and external customers to ensure deadlines are met and requirement evaluations are completed. In addition to the customer interface work, the position will require development of new technology & demonstrations of those new designs to find a solution that can meet performance expectations at the lowest cost.  The ideal candidate has experience with vehicle communication networks, MATLAB & Simulink, ECU Calibration & Analysis Software Tools (Vector, Intrepid Control, etc), Microsoft Office and can quickly learn internal tools. The ideal candidate possesses good communication skills, excellent problem-solving techniques, good organization and documentation abilities, knowledge of system synthesis, analysis and verification techniques and a general competency and experience in vehicle dynamics, mechanical systems, electronic systems, and computer hardware and software.
